statements: SELECT * FROM TaskProgress;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM TaskProgress WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE start_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY percentage_completion ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY percentage_completion DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, end_date FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion < 25 AND task_name LIKE 'Important%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, percentage_completion, end_date FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY percentage_completion ASC, task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, end_date, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE task_name NOT LIKE '%Research%' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress;
SELECT task_name, completion_percentage FROM TaskProgress WHERE completion_percentage > 50;
SELECT task_name, log_date FROM TaskProgress JOIN TaskLog ON TaskProgress.task_id = TaskLog.task_id;
SELECT task_name FROM TaskProgress ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskLog WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, completion_percentage FROM TaskProgress WHERE completion_percentage > 50 ORDER BY task_name ASC;

SELECT task_name, completion_percentage, log_details FROM TaskProgress JOIN TaskLog ON TaskProgress.task_id = TaskLog.task_id WHERE TaskProgress.completion_percentage < 100 ORDER BY TaskProgress.completion_percentage DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, log_date FROM TaskProgress JOIN TaskLog ON TaskProgress.task_id = TaskLog.task_id WHERE TaskLog.log_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY TaskLog.log_date ASC;

SELECT TaskLog.log_id, TaskProgress.task_name, TaskLog.log_details, TaskProgress.completion_percentage FROM TaskProgress JOIN TaskLog ON TaskProgress.task_id = TaskLog.task_id ORDER BY TaskProgress.completion_percentage DESC, TaskLog.log_date DESC;

SELECT TaskProgress.task_id, TaskProgress.task_name, TaskProgress.completion_percentage, COUNT(TaskLog.log_id) as total_logs FROM TaskProgress LEFT JOIN TaskLog ON TaskProgress.task_id = TaskLog.task_id GROUP BY TaskProgress.task_id HAVING total_logs > 0 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress ORDER BY percentage_completion DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, task_name, start_date FROM TaskAssignee JOIN TaskProgress ON TaskAssignee.task_id = TaskProgress.task_id;
SELECT * FROM TaskLogs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50;
SELECT task_id, task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50;
SELECT log_id, task_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM TaskLogs WHERE task_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT assignee_id, task_id, assignee_name FROM TaskAssignee WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE task_id IN (3, 7, 9) ORDER BY percentage_completion DESC;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, ta.assignee_name, ta.start_date FROM TaskProgress t JOIN TaskAssignee ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id WHERE ta.start_date <= CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM task_progress;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM task_progress;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM tasks WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM task_history WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM task_progress WHERE percentage_completion > 50;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM task_progress WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM tasks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT th.history_id, t.task_name, th.completion_date FROM task_history th JOIN tasks t ON th.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress;
SELECT task_id, assignee_name, deadline FROM AssignedTasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, percentage_completion FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50;
SELECT task_id, dependent_task_id FROM TaskDependencies WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT task_id, completion_date FROM TaskHistory ORDER BY completion_date;
SELECT * FROM TaskProgress WHERE percentage_completion > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT task_id, assignee_name, deadline FROM AssignedTasks WHERE deadline > NOW();
SELECT task_id, dependent_task_id FROM TaskDependencies WHERE task_id = 3 AND dependent_task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, completion_status, completion_date FROM TaskHistory WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, commenter_name, comment FROM TaskComments WHERE LENGTH(comment) > 50;
